Title: Expression Builder
Description: The purpose of this project is to provide reusable UI framework (WPF) for building expressions. For example, an expression "Name is "A" and Age is 10" could be represented by a tree consisting of a LogicalExpression "AND" with two children ComparisionExpressions.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The purpose of this project is to provide reusable UI framework (WPF) for building expressions. For example, an expression "Name is "A" and Age is 10" could be represented by a tree consisting of a LogicalExpression "AND" with two children ComparisionExpressions.
